briefTitle: Monitoring of Breast Cancers Treated by Neoadjuvant Radiotherapy Via Magnetic Resonance Imaging
officialTitle: Monitoring of Breast Cancers Treated by Neoadjuvant Radiotherapy Via Magnetic Resonance Imaging
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age ≥ 18 years
* Histological diagnosis of unifocal invasive breast carcinoma, no special type (ductal carcinoma)
* Tumor Staging: cT1-2N0M0
* Luminal A or B
* Candidate for breast conserving surgery
* N0-status confirmed by lymph node cytology

Exclusion Criteria:

* Multifocal/multicentric disease
* Prior thoracic radiotherapy
* Pregnancy
* SBR3 grading
* Triple negative status which benefit neoadjuvant chemotherapy
